channel.title: Client Username String (508)
channel.description: Does anyone know what the username variable is or where it's read *client-sided* on a standard 508 client? As in, if I wanted to make it println the character's name, what would I need to do? I'm assuming it's in the Login.java somewhere, help would be appreciated.

item.title: Client Username String (508)
item.dc:creator: @Whrithlin Whrithlin
item.description:
@Whrithlin wrote:

Does anyone know what the username variable is or where it’s read client-sided on a standard 508 client? As in, if I wanted to make it println the character’s name, what would I need to do? I’m assuming it’s in the Login.java somewhere, help would be appreciated.
